name: Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
tooltip:
Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
Item Level 60
Binds when picked up
Unique
Requires Level 60
Use: Exorcises the taint of Sargeras from Atiesh. Only usable on consecrated earth. (15 Min Cooldown)
"An entity of great evil is imprisoned within the staff."
